guide.heading: Veronica Valentine's Objective
body: To achieve Veronica Valentine's objective, you must

villain_deck.name: Double Agent
villain_deck.ability: When Double Agent is played, play them to a location another Villain's Realm. Double Agent is under that Villain's control.

guide.heading: Skull's Objective
body: To achieve Skull's objective, you must

locations.name: Location B
locations.upper: Play Card | Move Item or Ally

locations.name: Location D
locations.lower: Move Hero | Move Item or Ally

villain_deck.name: Double Agent
villain_deck.ability: When Double Agent is played, play them to a location another Villain's Realm. Double Agent is under that Villain's control.
